metadata.title: CVE-2018-11646 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
webkitFaviconDatabaseSetIconForPageURL andwebkitFaviconDatabaseSetIconURLForPageURL inUIProcess/API/glib/WebKitFaviconDatabase.cpp in WebKit, as used inWebKitGTK+ through 2.21.3, mishandle an unset pageURL, leading to anapplication crash.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-11646` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.20.1-1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.20.1-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.20.1-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.20.1-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.20.1-1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.20.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.20.1-1').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
